name: Endless Platformer Test
description:
Premise:

Make your way into the depths of hell as far as you can go. When you die you will be reborn into this infinite struggle. How far will you be able to survive?

Controls:

Space to Jump

Things To Do:

- time your jumps to make sure you don't fall to your death

- watch out for obstacles such as patrolling enemies, falling lava, or lava stains
